answers.answer: Hi there. A detailed neurological examination by a neurologist is required. eliminate fatigue, trauma, over exertion etc. check for diabetes, vitamin B12 deficiencies, spinal cord tumor, lumbar cord disc prolapsed, etc. any other associated complaints, and problems need to be closely examined and correlated. Certain blood tests and imaging studies are required for arriving at a plausible diagnosis and therapy would be according to the cause. Take care.

question: I collaps but do not go out. Now my legs have started to fell like they tremor. There is no warning at all. I just have my legs give out on me. Any ideas?
title: legs give out
